title.title: BALI SAFARI PARK AND ULUWATU TOUR

tagline.title: BALI SAFARI PARK AND ULUWATU TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR TO VISIT BALI SAFARI MARINE PARK AND CONTINUE TO VISIT ULUWATU TEMPLE AND WATCHING KECAK FIRE DANCE
tagline.text: BALI SAFARI PARK AND ULUWATU TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR TO VISIT BALI SAFARI MARINE PARK AND CONTINUE TO VISIT ULUWATU TEMPLE AND WATCHING KECAK FIRE DANCE
tagline.html: BALI SAFARI PARK AND ULUWATU TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR TO VISIT BALI SAFARI MARINE PARK AND CONTINUE TO VISIT ULUWATU TEMPLE AND WATCHING KECAK FIRE DANCE

description.text: Bali Safari Park and Uluwatu Tour is a Bali Combination Tour Packages to Visit Bali Safari and Marine Park and then continue visit Uluwatu Temple and other tourist destination. Bali Safari and Marine Park is famous activity for see many kinds of animal in the park and see the animal show perform in this park. the site will be visit during Bali Safari and Uluwatu Tour is to enjoy jungle hopper packages at Bali Safari and Marine Park first and then having lunch at the park, after lunch we continue the trip to uluwatu temple is sea temple located in the high cliff with breathtaking view of sunset and then we walk little bit to outdoor theater near the temple for enjoy watchinb traditional kecak and fire dance with professional dancer, which is the story taken from fragment Ramayana. After watching the dance we go back to your hotel with bring an awesome experience feature in this Bali Safari and Uluwatu Tour. Below is short description of Bali Safari Park and Uluwatu Tour places of interest will be visit.

title.title: Bali Safari and Marine Park - Jungle Hopper Packages

image.title: Bali Safari Park and Uluwatu  Tour | Bali Safari and Marine Park | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Safari and Marine Park features the following exhibits featuring wide range of animal species and some of the fascinating creatures that can be seen at the Bali Safari and Marine Park. Fulfilling its mission of conservation, education and recreation. The Safari Park of Jungle Hopper Packages offers an unforgettable tour and education experience among the more than 100 species of animals housed at the recreational park and active wildlife conservation center at Bali Safari Marine Park. Book this Bali Safari Park and Uluwatu Tour enjoy explore the biggest bali safari and see many kind of animal and bird, totally full of fun during your holiday

title.title: Uluwatu Temple | Bali Safari Park and Uluwatu  Tour

image.title: Bali Safari Park and Uluwatu  Tour | Uluwatu Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Uluwatu Temple is one of Balinese Hindu Temples located right on the petrifying hill with the crevasse exist in the right and left side. A small forest lies at the front and hundreds of monkeys dwell here. They are believed to guard the Uluwatu Temple from bad influences. The serpentine pathway to the temple is fortified by concrete walls on the cliff side. It takes about an hour to get from one end to another as there are several fenced points along the way to stop. The views Uluwatu Temple from the bottom of the water surging up against rocks and the ocean horizon are remarkable. This temple is very amazing where the location is right on the narrow peninsula with deep seawater under it.

title.title: Bali Safari Park and Uluwatu Tour | Kecak and Fire Dance Performance

image.title: Bali Safari Park and Uluwatu Tour | Kecak and Fire Dance Performance | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Kecak Dance is a spectacular traditional dance with the group of people playing this dance with fire game. Is a dance performance we will visit on Uluwatu Tour. It is very exciting and unique dance due to the sound of gamelan is not using the normal gamelan but use their mouth. The dancers make the compact choir with the exquisite dance movement that is one of this dance features. Kecak dance performance presents the dance as an introduction to the story a fragment from the Ramayana, the Hindu epic which finds its expression in many forms.

price.title: Bali Safari Park and Uluwatu Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Safari Park and Uluwatu Tour Price :

Adult

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,500,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,150,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 1,075,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 1,000,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 975,000/person

Children (3 - 12 years) :

  • 1 Child : IDR 800,000/person
  • 2 Child : IDR 775,000/person

Toodler (0 - 2 years) : Free of charge

Note : Get Special Price For Group Booking

Bali Safari Park and Uluwatu Tour Price Include :

  • Private Car with Good A/C
  • Professional English Speaking Driver
  • Bali Safari and Marine Park – Jungle Hopper Package
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Petrol
  • Entrance Ticket
  • Mineral Water

Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
